data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=d6jms10XLPcQ7kNvgGXe4ha&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDmCsc_PtaOmkYMk5PomGG4Ciy-sOm5s9a-XqMg-ib3mg&oe=6645C9CC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=M2zObkuXZQMQ7kNvgEk1tOM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB7qgIgsIdu-EBLtfpSBDboQ_wv_7vIYsCOSnPlkbEcXQ&oe=6646001F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035339_749541023684513_3682281630778817377_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=d40_VWr-agIQ7kNvgGswPVL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYChvOZyZTRE91QQdWuENtp-TLmbwKKPCbX5znl3AcyMVg&oe=6645FEA4)
